title: Google\Cloud\Build\V1\InlineSecret
name: InlineSecret
description:
Pairs a set of secret environment variables mapped to encrypted values with the Cloud KMS key to use to decrypt the value.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.InlineSecret

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.kms_key_name
params.description: Resource name of Cloud KMS crypto key to decrypt the encrypted value. In format: projects/*/locations/*/keyRings/*/cryptoKeys/*

params.name: data.env_map
params.description: Map of environment variable name to its encrypted value. Secret environment variables must be unique across all of a build's secrets, and must be used by at least one build step. Values can be at most 64 KB in size. There can be at most 100 secret values across all of a build's secrets.

methods.name: getKmsKeyName
methods.description:

In format: projects/*/locations/*/keyRings/*/cryptoKeys/*
